plot: S&M Hunter is a kind of bondage superhero who has a talent for tying up women in configurations that leave them helplessly aroused. When the all-girl gang, The Bombers, kidnap a man to use as their personal sex slave, S&M Hunter accepts the mission to infiltrate The Bombers' hideout and show them the ropes.
